entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain becoming mixed with snow after midnight. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Saturday 04 March 2023
